messages.message: Huggingface datasets have the option to clear up all the dataset cache files (https://huggingface.co/docs/datasets/v1.12.0/package_reference/main_classes.html#datasets.Dataset.cleanup_cache_files) except for the one that is currently used. Running this before the training could enable subsequent runs on the same datasets to reuse cache, and should keep the cache from growing too large.
